intent_atoms.description: Update the Design System Guide to include FoundationUI integration checklist, migration path, quality gates, and accessibility requirements.
Add "FoundationUI Integration Checklist" section to Design System Guide.
Document migration path from old UI patterns to FoundationUI components with code examples.
Add quality gates per integration phase (Phase 0-6).
Document accessibility requirements ensuring ≥98% WCAG 2.1 AA compliance.
Cross-reference ComponentTestApp and integration test suite.
Ensure all code examples are accurate and testable.
No broken links or references in the guide.
Design tokens must be used for spacing, colors, typography, and animations; no hard‑coded platform values.
FoundationUI components must be wrapped with domain‑specific semantics before exposure to business logic.
SwiftLint 0 violations, compiler warnings 0, test coverage ≥80%, accessibility audit ≥98% must hold for each phase.
Use a single file per component wrapper following "One File‑"‑one‑Entity principle.

functional_units.name: FoundationUI Integration Checklist
functional_units.description: Section detailing checklist items for integrating FoundationUI components into the app

functional_units.name: Migration Path to FoundationUI
functional_units.description: Guidance on mapping old UI patterns to new FoundationUI components with code examples and workflow

functional_units.name: Quality Gates per Integration Phase
functional_units.description: Defined quality criteria and gates for each of the six integration phases (Phase 0–6)

functional_units.name: Accessibility Requirements for FoundationUI Integration
functional_units.description: WCAG 2.1 AA compliance checklist, VoiceOver, keyboard navigation, dynamic‑type and color contrast guidelines

functional_units.name: ComponentTestApp Cross-References
functional_units.description: Links to live examples in ComponentTestApp and test suite references throughout the guide

functional_units.name: Design System Guide Update Process
functional_units.description: Procedure for reviewing current guide, adding new sections, and marking task completion
